abstract: The abdominally flawless Zuzana Light, 29, has become something of a fitness fetish.
snippet: The abdominally flawless Zuzana Light, 29, has become something of a fitness fetish.
lead_paragraph: Through her Web site, bodyrock.tv, the abdominally flawless Zuzana Light, 29, has become something of a fitness fetish. Her calorie-clobbering workouts are watched on YouTube by about 25 million visitors each month. Yet just five years ago, she was emotionally adrift in her native Prague, earning her keep as a nude model. "It was an incredibly humiliating situation," she said. On vacation, she met her future husband and partner, Frederick Light, who brought her back to Ontario, where the couple worked at a flower shop and filmed exercise videos in their free time. Light's workout relies on "short, intense" exercises that riff on the burpee, a suicide sequence of squats, push-ups and jumping that's catching on at gyms across the country.
